summary: Al-Qaeda founder - CIA asset (1980s Afghanistan) turned adversary, 9/11 mastermind
key_facts: CIA-supported Mujahideen fighter in Soviet-Afghan War (1980s)
Operation Neptune Spear - killed in Abbottabad, Pakistan (May 2, 2011)
Classic 'blowback' case: US-trained asset becomes primary adversary
concealment: Extent of 1980s CIA relationship, Pakistan ISI protection during 2000s
